name: fulldeck
description: Full-stack gaming platform with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.startlocal: echo '=== NEW SESSION STARTED:' $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) '===' > test-session.log && echo 'Frontend/Backend Test Log - Auto-generated, not committed' >> test-session.log && echo '========================================================' >> test-session.log && npm run sync-core && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && set NODE_ENV=development && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web -- --port 3000"
scripts.startlocal-qa: echo '=== NEW SESSION STARTED:' $(date -u +%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ) '===' > test-session.log && echo 'Frontend/Backend Test Log - Auto-generated, not committed' >> test-session.log && echo '========================================================' >> test-session.log && npm run sync-core && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && set NODE_ENV=qa && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web -- --port 3000"
scripts.startlocal-staging: npm run sync-core && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && set NODE_ENV=staging && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web -- --port 3000"
scripts.startlocal-prod: npm run sync-core && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd .. && concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix name --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && set NODE_ENV=production && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run web -- --port 3000"
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=frontend && npm install --workspace=backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=frontend && npm run build --workspace=backend
